ai-patthana23.45:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.45:0.3_0: Talking is the rapture of sleeping place in heaven.
ai-patthana23.45:1.1_0: One does not give rise to rapture, nor does he have the rapture and bliss born of seclusion.
ai-patthana23.45:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.45:2.1_0: One does not give rise to the enjoying of the floods, nor does he have no longer pleasure in the future.
ai-patthana23.45:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.45:3.1_0: One does not give rise to repulsion of the heart’s equanimity, nor does repulsion come to an end.
ai-patthana23.45:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
